content.rendered:
Summary

  • Concerts
  • After Parties
  • Other Events

During the NFR 2023, there will be various entertainment options around town, including concerts, after-parties, and other events. Here are some of the highlights:

Concerts

Several concerts featuring popular country music artists will be held at various venues around Las Vegas:

  • Garth Brooks will perform at The Colosseum at Caesars Palace on November 29, December 1, 2, 6, 8, 9, 13, 15, and 16.
  • Carrie Underwood’s REFLECTION will be held at Dolby Live at Park MGM.
  • Gary Allan will perform on December 8 at The Chelsea at The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas.
  • Glen Templeton will perform on December 8 at William-Hill Sports Book at Palms Casino Resort.
  • Jim Jefferies will perform on December 8 & 9 at The Mirage Theatre at The Mirage Resort & Casino.
  • Mark Wills will perform on December 8 at The Showroom at Golden Nugget.
  • Brian Lynn Jones will perform on December 8 & 9 at Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island / TI Hotel & Casino.
  • Jon Pardi will perform on December 9 at Michelob Ultra Arena at Mandalay Bay.
  • Clay Walker will perform on December 9, 10 & 11 at Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island / TI Hotel & Casino.
  • Ray Wylie Hubbard will perform on December 10 at The Showroom at Golden Nugget.
  • Seth Ward and the Silence will perform on December 11, 12 & 14 at Cabaret Theater & Convention Center at Westgate Las Vegas.
  • Will Jones will perform on December 11 at William-Hill Sports Book at Palms Casino Resort.
  • Little Texas will perform on December 11 at The Showroom at Golden Nugget.
  • Chancey Williams will perform on December 11 & 12 at the South Point Showroom at South Point Hotel Casino & Spa.
  • Just Dave Band will perform on December 11 & 12 at LeAnn Rimes.
  • LeAnn Rimes will perform on December 15 & 16 at The Venetian Theater at Venetian.
  • Braxton Keith will perform on December 15 at Cabaret Theater at Westgate, Las Vegas.
  • Jeff Foxworthy will perform on December 15 & 16 at The Mirage Theatre at The Mirage Resort & Casino.
  • Eddie Montgomery will perform on December 15 at The Showroom at Golden Nugget.
  • Mario Barth & About Kings will perform on December 15 at Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island / TI Hotel & Casino.

After Parties

There will be several after-parties held at various venues around Las Vegas:

  • The Mirage will transform its Sportsbook into a Honky-Tonk Desert every night from December 1 – 10, starting at 9:30 pm ET.
  • Virgin Hotels Las Vegas will host the Official Wrangler NFR Viewing Party from December 1 – 10, starting at 4 p.m.
  • NFR After Dark at Westgate Las Vegas will be open from December 1 – 10, starting at 4 p.m.
  • Gary Leffew’s Buckaroo Ball will be open from December 1 – 10, starting at 5 p.m.
  • Buckin’ Bash After Party will be held nightly at 9 p.m. from December 1 – 10 at The Orleans Hotel & Casino — Bourbon Street Lounge.

Other Events

In addition to concerts and after-parties, there will be other events around town:

  • NFR® Live Entertainment at TI will be held at Treasure Island & Gilley’s Saloon, the official sponsor of the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo® Bull Riders, from December 7 – 16, 2023.
  • The Wrangler NFR Autograph Sessions will be held at various locations and times.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas will be held on December 1 at the Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls.
  • The PRCA Annual Awards Banquet will be held on December 1 at the South Point Grand Ballroom.
  • The Wrangler NFR Kickoff Party will be held on December 1 at the South Point Showroom.

Golam Muktadir
@graph.description: Golam Muktadir is a passionate sports fan and a dedicated movie buff. He has been writing about both topics for over a decade and has a wealth of knowledge and experience to share with his readers. Muktadir has a degree in journalism and has written for several well-known publications, including Surprise Sports.
